program.name: silo
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-DPIC -O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+Z +O2 -z +Ofltacc +Olit=all \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+Z +O2 -z +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+Z +O2 -z +Ofltacc +Olit=all \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-KPIC -Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro -fPIC" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -fPIC" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-DPIC -O2 -ieee -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4 -KPIC" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa -KPIC" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis -KPIC" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
rm -f config.cache ${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_READLINE_INC} ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}} \ -DH5_USE_16_API" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_READLINE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_HDF5_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB}:${SB_VAR_READLINE_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ --with-hdf5=${SB_VAR_HDF5_INC},${SB_VAR_HDF5_LIB} \ --with-zlib=${SB_VAR_ZLIB_INC},${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} \ --without-exodus \ --disable-sdx --without-python --disable-browser \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -d -m 755 -o root -g 0 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX} \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m644 silo/silo/silo.h silo/silo/silo.inc \ silo/sdx/sdx.h silo/sdx/sdx.inc ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} lib/libsilo.a ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-irix*) ;; *) ranlib ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/lib*a ;; esac
:
